ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), RecordType.Name = "Windstream D2D",
OR( ISBLANK(WIN_Sales_Login__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the WIN Sales Login before saving record.
